name: Bubble Saga
summary: The fairest prince of all has announced that he is ready to marry, and princesses from faraway lands have gathered to compete for his favour and half the kingdom. You are one of the princesses, and only flowers stand between you and your dream husband.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 动作
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 官方网站: http://www.king.com/games/action-games/bubble-saga
